sentences.en: All purely professional performance, I think, are something revolting.
sentences.cn: 我觉得全是职业舞蹈动作, 而且有反叛的味道.

sentences.en: Do I smell the revolting stench of self - esteem ?
sentences.cn: 我怎么感觉到这里有一些跃跃欲试的 自尊心 呢 ?

sentences.en: Have a sniff of this medicine — It'smells revolting, doesn't it?
sentences.cn: 闻一下这种药——它有一种令人作呕的味道, 对 吗 ?

sentences.en: Have a sniff of this medicine—it smells revolting,doesn't it?
sentences.cn: 闻一下这种药——它有一种令人作呕的味道，对吗？
他双脚散发的气味让人恶心.

sentences.en: It is revolting to our idea of morality.
sentences.cn: 这违反我们的道德观念.

sentences.en: It was revolting to the Englishman's idea of fair play.
sentences.cn: 这件事违反了英国人的公平竞争精神.

sentences.en: It was the most revolting thing I have ever tasted.
sentences.cn: 这是我吃过的最让人反胃的东西。

sentences.en: See what all with a revolting feeling , fidgety, become angry frequently.
sentences.cn: 看什么都不顺眼, 烦躁, 动辄发火.

sentences.en: The smell in the cell was revolting.
Unfortunately it made such a revolting brew that it was worse than drinking no tea at all.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是，所沏的茶实在难喝，还不如不喝呢。

sentences.en: What a revolting humbug the man was!
sentences.cn: 那人真是个令人作呕的伪君子！

sentences.en: Women were revolting against the restrictions on job opportunities.
sentences.cn: 妇女反对就业机会的限制.

words.tran_cn: 背叛地；讨厌地；令人恶心地

trans.tran_cn: 叛乱的，背叛的，使人厌恶的
使厌恶(revolt的现在分词形式)，反叛，背叛
